text:
On Enoshima Beach, basking in strong sunlight,
a voice called out to [Player].

name: Astar
text:
S-Sorry to keep you waiting.
Voice person.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Yes, it's not bad at all.
Running on unstable sand is perfect for training.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
In addition to that, the burden on the joints seems small on sand.
I might even add it to my future menu.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...What's with that expression?
Do you have a problem with how I spend my time?

options.text: The Aloha style suits you too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-Is that so...?
I felt it was a bit too flamboyant, but if "you" said so...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text: Sometimes, wearing this kind of outfit might not be so bad.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, you too...
I think it suits you very well.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Of course.
To become "Santa", physical training is essential.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text: Especially this season, I'm focusing on training to prepare for the "main event" (Christmas).

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...However, isn't your gaze a bit too dazzling?

name: Astar
text:
What!?
What is that in your hand?

name: Astar
text:
Sun oil...?
And you're going to apply
that to me...?

name: Astar
text:
D-Don't make that face!
I do not, by any means, dislike it!

name: Astar
text:
It was just an unexpected development,
so I was a bit taken aback.
...D-Do as you please.

name: Astar
text:
However, it's...
How should I put it...

name: Astar
text:
Thinking that I'm being touched by
your warm hands like this, I...!

[Player] and Astar enjoyed
their intimate time together.

name: Astar
text:
...Thank you, voice person.
Not bad... no.
It was, quite fun... of a moment.

name: Astar
text:
Wh-What are you laughing at!?
I'm seriousâ€”

name: Astar
text:
N-Never mind.
Well then, I shall frolic in the waves.
Hold onto my arm.
